summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with The Haze Trust for the period from June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It details significant deposits, including a large incoming money transfer from Christie's Inc., and provides information on service charges and account management procedures.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A significant incoming money transfer of $7,725,000.00 was credited to the account from Christie's Inc.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3 St, Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance as of June 1, 2017, was $1,429.44.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2017, was $7,726,429.44.
A large deposit of $7,725,000.00 was made on June 19, 2017, from Christie's Inc.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during this statement period.
Cynthia Rodriguez is the contact person for account inquiries.
